what is mangapin?

mangapin is a personal board for mangas I recommend (〃￣ω￣〃ゞ


this is a place where I drop my favorite reads to share with friends. slice of life, shoujo and adventure are the genres I love and read most so you can find a lot of those here.
i might add new features like a comment board and genre filters! look forward to it :)

have fun and read on~ (σ･ω･)σ
